page.title: 03CHIPLEY
page.content: Chipley is a very small village,most of the houses are modern except for the farmhouses and Chipley Court(which has belonged to the Sandford family for generations).There are lots of fields around the village.Most of the people who live in the village work on farms close by.On the farm they grow vegetables and fruit(mainly pears). They also do a lot of silaging.With the silage they make calf pellets. Most of the women are housewives, butthey help with the blackcurrant picking in the summer.Most families have children but there is no school so they go to the nearest town which is Langford Budville.The nearest big town is Wellington,about 3 miles away.The population of the village is only about thirty people.
